Title: Smart Voice
Description: Smart Voice let's you control Skype using your voice. It allows you to write messages, issue phone calls, etc. This application was developed thinking in cars and was made for a curricular unit at my university. Currently I'm using C#/.NET, Microsoft SAPI and the Skype API.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Smart Voice let's you control Skype using your voice. It allows you to write messages, issue phone calls, etc. This application was developed thinking in cars and was made for a curricular unit at my university. Currently I'm using C#/.NET, Microsoft SAPI and the Skype API.
